data.prayer: Spirit, help the 116 believers find a person of peace today among the 385 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nanumanga, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 116 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Nanumanga. Through your servants plant 1 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, help the 116 believers in Nanumanga to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Toga Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Toga Village, Nanumanga, Tuvalu.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Nanumanga, Tuvalu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Nanumanga. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Nanumanga will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.
